image_analysis.description: A composite image showing four pages of a deposition transcript, arranged in a two-by-two grid. The pages are numbered 109, 110, 111, and 112. The text is a typed transcript with timestamps and line numbers in the left margin of each page. The document discusses legal proceedings involving individuals named Dershowitz and Epstein.
image_analysis.layout: The image is a composite of four pages. Page 109 is top-left, 111 is top-right, 110 is bottom-left, and 112 is bottom-right. Each page has a two-column format with timestamps and line numbers on the left and the transcribed text on the right. There are headers with page numbers and footers with company information and a document identifier at the very bottom of the image.

document_metadata.subject: Deposition regarding Mr. Dershowitz and Mr. Epstein, discussing alleged stall tactics, Fifth Amendment invocation, and involvement of others like Ghislaine Maxwell.

notes: The document is a transcript of a deposition that took place on October 20, 2015. The dates mentioned within the transcript (2005, 2006, 2009, 2011, 2013, 2014) are references to past events. The name 'Glenn Maxwell' is mentioned as a nickname for 'Ghislaine Maxwell'.
